explanation:
code_hardening: Added null and empty checks for the URI, validated presence and position of '?', guarded against empty queries, empty pairs, and malformed key/value segments, and always initialized and returned a LinkedHashMap to avoid crashes.
resolve_compilation_errors: Renamed the method to getSimpleQueryMap, changed the parameter type to String, removed the checked exception from the signature, and ensured URLDecoder.decode is called with the explicit "UTF-8" charset.
exception_handling: Wrapped decoding in a try-catch for UnsupportedEncodingException, printed the stack trace, and returned the current (possibly empty) map instead of throwing.
logic_customization: Implemented query parsing by splitting the URI on '?', then '&' and '=', maintained a simple one-to-one mapping with overwrite behavior, and preserved UTF-8 decoding.
refactoring: Updated method and variable names (uri, queryMap) and simplified control flow while keeping insertion order via LinkedHashMap.
misc: Added minimal defensive checks and relied on printStackTrace for lightweight logging; no new custom API calls were introduced beyond those already present in the project (none).
